name: Bewinced
description:
Match 3 or more to rack up those numbers for #MediumSales and beyond. Will Barry be able to bring hungry Wince a Blue Spark and a pheasant sand-hwich?

Not intended for children or Big Wincy. Prior knowledge of wing chun highly recommended. Side effects may include polio. Always read the label.

Written in C++/SFML

Music credit: Meatball Parade by Kevin MacLeod (License: CC BY A 3.0)
